title: STUDIO APT. WITH AiR CONDITIONING & SPECTACULAR VIEWS
map_address: 5292 S Maryland Pkwy near Tropicana Ave.
app_fee: $45 application fee for credit and background screening
posting_body: ['Dorm style!', 'Quail Ridge', 'CALL US TODAY:', 'show contact info', 'x255', 'Want more information?', '<URL>', 'DESCRIPTION:', 'Mingle with neighbors in a shared living room and kitchen while enjoying your cozy studio at Quail Ridge.', 'These studio homes have their own private entries, as well as spacious patios and balconies featuring scenic views of the property.', 'Settle in and make this layout entirely yours.', 'Add décor to built-in shelving and fill the extra-large closets with your wardrobe.', 'You can find your ideal temperature with the help of individual climate controls and complement it with the cool breeze from the ceiling fan.', 'The community invites you to lounge poolside, join neighbors in a game of billiards, or enjoy barbecuing in the picnic area.', 'Less than a mile away, you can treat yourself to the plant-based specialties at Panchos Vegan Tacos Tropicana.', 'Call today to learn more about living at Quail Ridge.', 'OFFICE HOURS:', 'Monday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Tuesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Wednesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Thursday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Friday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Saturday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'AVAILABLE\u2002 \u2002FLOORPLANS (type, bed/bath, rent, Sq.Ft)', 'Studio Quad', ', Studio , 1 ba , Please Call, 250 Sq.', 'Ft', 'PROPERTY AMENITIES:', '* Pool', '* Laundry', '* Clubhouse', '* Business Center', '* Short-Term Lease', '* Package Receiving', '* On-site Maintenance', '* On-site Management', '* Picnic Area with BBQ Grills', '* Transportation', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Online Leasing URL:', '<URL>', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x255', 'Address:', '5292 S Maryland Pkwy Las Vegas, NV 89119', 'Managed By: ConAm Management Equal Housing Opportunity']
